record.id: field.name="alias" and file.name="auditspecs" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: alias
record.file.name: auditspecs

brief.brief: The alias for the fieldname used in the Audit Log file.
Entries in the Audit Log use the actual Fieldname by default. You can override the default by specifying an Alias.

detail.detail: There is a one-to-one correlation between the Field Name and Alias input fields.
Due to processing considerations, these are independent arrays. When scrolling one, you must also scroll the other to keep the definitions synchronized.
Use meaningful aliases. For example, the field name fixed.asset.number is more meaningful than the field name fd.ast.no.
